channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- PowerVM Hypervisor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- PowerVM Hypervisor

item.title: CVE-2021-38937|2024-08-04T01:51:20.320Z -- ibm -- powervm%20hypervisor
item.description: IBM PowerVM Hypervisor FW940, FW950, and FW1010 could allow an authenticated user to cause the system to crash using a specially crafted IBMi Hypervisor call. IBM X-Force ID: 210894.

item.title: CVE-2021-38918|2024-08-04T01:51:20.877Z -- ibm -- powervm%20hypervisor
item.description: IBM PowerVM Hypervisor FW860, FW940, FW950, and FW1010, through a specific sequence of VM management operations could lead to a violation of the isolation between peer VMs. IBM X-Force ID: 210019.

item.title: CVE-2021-38923|2024-08-04T01:51:20.506Z -- ibm -- powervm%20hypervisor
item.description: IBM PowerVM Hypervisor FW1010 could allow a privileged user to gain access to another VM due to assigning duplicate WWPNs. IBM X-Force ID: 210162.

item.title: CVE-2021-38917|2024-08-04T01:51:20.875Z -- ibm -- powervm%20hypervisor
item.description: IBM PowerVM Hypervisor FW860, FW940, and FW950 could allow an attacker that gains service access to the FSP can read and write arbitrary host system memory through a series of carefully crafted service procedures. IBM X-Force ID: 210018.

item.title: CVE-2023-46183|2024-02-06T16:05:23.158Z -- ibm -- powervm%20hypervisor
item.description: IBM PowerVM Hypervisor FW950.00 through FW950.90, FW1020.00 through FW1020.40, and FW1030.00 through FW1030.30 could allow a system administrator to obtain sensitive partition information. IBM X-Force ID: 269695.

item.title: CVE-2023-46183|2024-08-02T20:37:40.043Z -- ibm -- powervm%20hypervisor
item.description: IBM PowerVM Hypervisor FW950.00 through FW950.90, FW1020.00 through FW1020.40, and FW1030.00 through FW1030.30 could allow a system administrator to obtain sensitive partition information. IBM X-Force ID: 269695.
